Style/ClassAndModuleChildren.description:
Description

Checks style of children classes and modules.
Style/ClassAndModuleChildren.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: nested (type: str)
SupportedStyles: ['nested', 'compact'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyleForClasses: None (type: NoneType)
SupportedStylesForClasses: [None, 'nested', 'compact'] (type: list)
EnforcedStyleForModules: None (type: NoneType)
SupportedStylesForModules: [None, 'nested', 'compact'] (type: list)
